entries.message: We are currently aware of multiple issues degrading the deploy quality of GPU products at this time. We are working diligently to restore functionality to our deploy images.

Event Type: Storage Infrastructure Maintenance
Start Time: 2023-11-13 13:00:00 America/Los_Angeles
End Time: 2023-11-14 19:00:00 America/Los_Angeles

Our Cloud Storage team will be performing upgrades to our Silicon Valley deployment infrastructure starting at 2023-11-13 21:00:00 UTC. During this maintenance window, new deployments, snapshot functionality, HDD Block devices, and custom ISOs may be temporarily unavailable.

Previously deployed servers in Silicon Valley will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.
Unhair Pin ER's in LAX - Maintenance completed All transit circuits were moved to new ER 10k2 and 10k8 was unhair-pin and now function as Spine only

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Los Angeles location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-11-14 08:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-11-14 12:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Los Angeles instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

service_alerts.subject: Potential service disruption in Tel Aviv

entries.message:
The Constant Company, creator of Vultr, is aware of and following the situation in Israel. At this time we do not expect any disruption of service in our Tel Aviv location.  We will continue to closely monitor services as the situation evolves, and we will advise our customers of any changes which have the potential to impact service delivery.

We believe this is a crucial time to remind our customers about the importance of the 3-2-1 Backup Strategy for safeguarding all critical data. Please see the case study here for more information: https://www.vultr.com/docs/case-study-use-a-321-backup-strategy-at-vultr/

Please note that Vultr Snapshots and Backups are stored in the same location as the instance they are made from, however when you deploy a new instance from them in a different location, they will be automatically transferred and stored in the new location as well.
